          <title>
            <string language="en">Transmission of action potential along a myelinated axon</string>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Übertragung des Aktionspotentials entlang a 
myelinated Axon</string>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">La transmission du potentiel d'action le long de 
a myelinated l'axone</string>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">A transmissão do potencial de ação ao longo de 
a myelinated o axon</string>
            <string language="x-mt-it">La trasmissione di potenziale di azione lungo la a
myelinated l'assone</string>
            <string language="x-mt-el">Η μετάδοση της δυνατότητας ενέργειας κατά μήκος του α
ο νευρίτης</string>
            <string language="x-mt-es">La transmisión del potencial de acción a lo 
largo de a myelinated el axon</string>
          </title>
          <description>
            <string language="en">This diagram illustrates the transmission of action potential in an axon covered with myelin sheath.</string>
          </description>

          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Dieses Diagramm veranschaulicht die Übertragung 
des Aktionspotentials in einem Axon, der mit myelin Hülle umfaßt 
wird.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">Ce diagramme illustre la transmission du 
potentiel d'action dans un axone couvert de gaine de myelin.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">Este diagrama ilustra a transmissão do potencial 
de ação em um axon coberto com a bainha do myelin.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-it">Questo schema illustra la trasmissione di 
potenziale di azione in un assone coperto di fodero di myelin.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-el">Αυτό το διάγραμμα επεξηγεί τη μετάδοση της 
δυνατότητας ενέργειας σε έναν νευρίτη που καλύπτεται με τη θήκη 
myelin.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-es">Este diagrama ilustra la transmisión del 
potencial de acción en un axon cubierto con la envoltura del myelin.</string>
          </description>
